title.narrative: CHILDCARE SYSTEM STRENGTHENING

description.narrative: Childcare system is strengthened to effectively address family separation, adversity and exclusion, by establishing mechanisms and services, and development of capacity of the health and social service workforce, which contributes to Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: All boys and girls and families have equitable access to and utilize quality integrated social services that ensure survival and health, provision of nurturing care and protection from adversity

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Childcare system is strengthened to effectively address family separation, adversity and exclusion, by establishing mechanisms andservices, and development of capacity of the health and social service workforce

description.narrative: Advocacy efforts and technical support provided through the programme guaranteed that at the end of 2021, North Macedonia continues to maintain zero children in large scale residential institutions, despite challenges of backward trends, including growing poverty. UNICEF’s long-term support provided to the Government yielded results inimproving quality of service provided to children in foster and kinship care. In particular, the MoLSP redirectedsizeable human and financial resources from institutional to community and family-based care, including for establishment of foster care support centers for the first time in the system, with technical assistance from UNICEF.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2022
